actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security

official_title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to require the Federal Trade Commission to submit to Congress a report on gasoline prices by November 8, 2005.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to make November 8, 2005, the deadline for the Federal Trade Commission's report to Congress on its investigation into whether the price of gasoline is being artificially manipulated by reduction in refinery capacity or by any other form of market manipulation or price gouging practices.

titles.title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to require the Federal Trade Commission to submit to Congress a report on gasoline prices by November 8, 2005.
